messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Clive Sinclaire
To: token_kenkyu_kai@...
Cc: nihonto@yahoogroups.com ; samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, October 01, 2004 11:58 PM
Subject: Hideaki


Gentlemen
For those of you interested in swords made from the guns of the Mikasa by Minanmoto Hideaki or the Battle of Tsushima,it may be worth a cursory glance at the latest posting on www.To-ken.com under Articles. Of course I understand if interest is less than consuming, but there it is.
Regards
Clive
